Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Tile.java Constructs a Tile object, representing a square in the sudoku grid.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tile(int X, int Y)
      Constructs a Tile object.

      Get the number of possible values that can be used in this tile.
